institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training project operation rules/Article 36 (excluding details of subsidy expenditure)
contents: Article 36 (Excluding details of subsidy expenditures) ① Amounts refunded or deducted after the fact, such as customs duties, value-added tax, and corporate tax on interest income from subsidy, are excluded from the details of use of subsidy for the relevant year. ② Notwithstanding paragraph 1, value-added tax is excluded. If value-added tax, such as purchase tax related to a business supplying exempt goods or services (tap water, educational services, etc.), cannot be refunded, value-added tax can be included in the support fund.
